ooC: Aight, I would have posted, but my comp crashed and I lost a 
big long Megatron post, so I kinda threw it out the window (not 
literally of course, if I actually HAD thrown it out the window, i'd 
need to buy a new one, and I can't afford that). *sigh*

Anyway, I kinda stabbed myself in the foot about the magneto-shells 
thing. I was intending to change some of the rules (after a council 
review) thus legalizing EMP (to a degree), seeking missiles, and 
perhaps flash bombs.

It was also a little overwhelming to see 60 posts in less than two 
days when i logged on to post for Megatron (the post i lost in the 
comp crash). Posts are supposed to last a very short amount of time. 
In battles, since there are many people involved, role players 
should not just keep posting, but wait for the rest of the RPG to 
catch up. In the 60 posts several new characters were introduced at 
the Predacon base, and a bunch of other stuff happened, while 
Megatron 'lagged out'. =P Just a reminds to keep an eye on those 
things.

Cardhead, When Azure suggested you hold your posting, you should 
hold your posting. He's not a moderator just so he can stand around 
and look pretty. Moderators are to be listened too, that way 
mistakes or misconceptions can be picked up and fixed before 
anything disasterous happens (we hope anyway). =)

Lastly, I'd like to congratulate people on the excellent posting 
that I read while I was busy catching up. ^^
